price: Hakika sisi tunatumai Mola wetu Mlezi atatusamehe makosa yetu, kwa kuwa ndio wa kwanza wa kuamini.
arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Hakika sisi tunataraji Mola wetu Mlezi atatusamehe makosa yetu tuliyo yafanya zamani, kwa kuwa sisi ndio wa mwanzo wa Waumini katika kaumu yako.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā naṭmaʿu an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwala al-mu'minīna
